EmailTemplate.description: Use to promote the benefits of web over audio for upsell
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet - Audio Upsell 2
EmailTemplate.subject: You are DUE for a better meeting tool!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://www.pgi.com
NOW THERE'S A BETTER WAY TO COLLABORATE WHEN AND WHERE YOU WANT
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
What if you could have the mobility of your audio calls with the benefits of web conferencing? Now you can – with GlobalMeet. Collaborate with people from your desk, mobile phone or tablet... it's that easy.
GlobalMeet gives you the most intuitive service on the market and lets you work the way you work best – when and where you want.
GlobalMeet is ideal for:
Real-time content sharing for more productive collaboration Accelerating on-boarding process or conducting large trainings Daily collaboration or ad-hoc meetings – even if you are on-the-go
WANT TO LEARN MORE?
I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have or even provide you with an online demo so you can experience what GlobalMeet can do for you.
Contact me now to schedule your demo.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Email}
{!User.Phone}
